display_long_description:
Audioshield is the music game for your entire music collection. Just download your songs using the Quest's Browser, launch Audioshield, and play with your own music! It also comes with 20 great songs ready to go.

Experience your entire music collection in VR. Audioshield puts you at the point of impact for every hit in your music. Beats glide in slowly for mellow parts of songs, then ramp up for intense parts of songs with cross-body, double-shield, and high-altitude hits.

Audioshield uses an advanced version of Audiosurf's music analysis system to automatically sync with any song from your collection.

Every song has its own online leaderboard. Punch hard, but don't miss, to get the top scores.

-- Update 4.30.2020 --
- Transparent shields
- Subfolder browsing (Music folder only)
- New option: decrease distant orb height
- New option: smooth incoming orb speed
- New option: reverse colors
- New option: hide purple shield
